headline: AppLovin Corporation (APP): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on AppLovin Corporation (APP) on Substack by Jimmy Investor. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on APP. AppLovin Corporation (APP)’s share was trading at $257.76 as of March 11th. APP’s trailing and forward P/E were 56.86 and 37.31 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. AppLovin (APP) has established itself […]

headline: AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP) Sees 21% Price Drop Following Class Action Lawsuit Allegations
summary: The recent legal troubles surrounding AppLovin (NasdaqGS:APP), including a class action lawsuit alleging securities law violations and accusations of unethical practices from Fuzzy Panda Research, have likely played a significant role in the company’s 21% share price decline over the past week. These allegations raise concerns over its business practices and growth claims, notably tied to its AXON 2.0 platform. Despite the broader market's tech rally led by companies like Tesla and Nvidia...

headline: Down 55% From Its High, Is AppLovin Stock a Good Buy Right Now?
summary: Tech stock AppLovin (NASDAQ: APP) hit a 52-week high of $525.15 on Feb. 13.  It's staggering just how quickly things have unraveled for this once red-hot growth stock.  The stock market hasn't been doing all that well of late amid growing concerns of trade wars and tariffs, but that's not the only reason AppLovin stock is down.
